title: Passion Cafe Playa den Bossa
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe offering vegetarian, raw, and vegan dishes. Has freshly squeezed juices, smoothies, and protein shakes with boosters like wheatgrass, milk thistle, ginseng, and echinacea. Salads are a specialty, like the couscous salad and the macrobiotic tofu salad. Located on main strip of shops near Ushuaia Hotel.
